Package com.mongodb.operation

Class BaseFindAndModifyOperation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.operation.BaseFindAndModifyOperation<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the document type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncWriteOperation<T>, WriteOperation<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FindAndDeleteOperation, FindAndReplaceOperation, FindAndUpdateOperation
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BaseFindAndModifyOperation<T>
extends Object
implements AsyncWriteOperation<T>, WriteOperation<T>
    Abstract base class for findAndModify-based operations
    Since:
    3.8

        Construct a new instance.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the database and collection namespace for the operation.
        writeConcern - the writeConcern for the operation
        retryWrites - if writes should be retried if they fail due to a network error.
        decoder - the decoder for the result documents.
